org.easybatch.core.mapper

Interface RecordMapper<I extends Record,O extends Record>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - The input record type.
    O - The output record type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    RecordProcessor<I,O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApacheCommonCsvRecordMapper, BatchMapper, DelimitedRecordMapper, FixedLengthRecordMapper, GsonRecordMapper, JacksonRecordMapper, JdbcRecordMapper, MongoDBRecordMapper, OpenCsvRecordMapper, SpringJdbcRecordMapper, XmlRecordMapper, XstreamRecordMapper

    public interface RecordMapper<I extends Record,O extends Record>
extends RecordProcessor<I,O>
    A record mapper maps a Record to a GenericRecord having a domain object as payload.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      O processRecord(I record)
      Map the record to a GenericRecord having a domain object as payload.

    • Method Detail

      • processRecord

        O processRecord(I record)
                               throws RecordMappingException
        Map the record to a GenericRecord having a domain object as payload.
        Specified by:
        processRecord in interface RecordProcessor<I extends Record,O extends Record>
        Parameters:
        record - the record to map.
        Returns:
        a GenericRecord having a domain object as payload
        Throws:
        RecordMappingException - if an error occurs during record mapping
